sourcesContent:
What is your Name?

Hello {{ name }}!
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-welcome', templateUrl: './welcome.component.html', styleUrls: ['./welcome.component.scss'], }) export class WelcomeComponent { currentStep = 1; name = ''; namePattern = '^[a-zA-Z ]*$'; previousStep() { if (this.currentStep > 1) { this.currentStep--; } } nextStep() { if (this.currentStep < 3) { this.currentStep++; } } }
